mapper.delete: DELETE FROM glamp_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND glamp_id = #{glampId}
mapper.select: SELECT glamp_id AS glampId, glamp_name AS glampName, star_point_avg AS starPointAvg, glamp_location AS glampLocation, glamp_intro AS glampIntro, info_basic AS infoBasic, info_parking AS infoParking, info_notice AS infoNotice FROM glamping WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId}
SELECT B.user_name AS userName, A.review_content AS content FROM review A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE glamp_id = #{glampId};
